attributes.action: Give scotland back full control of its own fishing industry and waters including rockall without being in a european common fisheries policy.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is completely ruining our way of life as fishermen in the outer hebrides, And scotland as a whole, it is not fair that we have to suffer because of some deal done by an incompetent political party in the early 70s, we heavily depend on our waters as a lifeline,we have had our sea and land raped of almost all its valuable assets to date,please dont leave it any longer for the fishing that we have had as a way of life for thousands of years,PLEASE give us our seas back in our own COUNTRIES COMPLETE CONTROL NOW BEFORE IT IS GONE FOREVER, AS WE HAVE SEEN HAPPEN OTHER COUNTRIES WATERS.

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
